36 namespace Mutation { namespace Thermodynamics { class Thermodynamics; }}

39 namespace Mutation {
40  namespace GasSurfaceInteraction {
41 
42 class DataSolidProperties;
43 class SurfaceProperties;
44 class SolidProperties;
45 
46 //==============================================================================
47 /*
48  * Class which keeps the thermodynamics state of the surface in terms of
49  * partial densities and temperatures. The state can be set and retrieved
50  * through setter and getter functions. It also acts as an interface for
51  * additional surface or bulk properties necessary for gas-surface interaction
52  * processes.
53  */
54 class SurfaceState
55 {
56 public:
60  SurfaceState(
61  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo,
62  const Mutation::Utilities::IO::XmlElement& xml_surf_props);
63 
67  ~SurfaceState();
68 
75  void setSurfaceState(
76  const double* const p_mass,
77  const double* const p_energy,
78  const int state_var = 1);
79 
86  void getSurfaceState(
87  double* const p_rhoi,
88  double* const p_rhoie,
89  const int state_var = 1) const;
90 
95  void setSurfaceRhoi(const double* const p_rhoi);
96 
100  void setSurfaceT(const double* const p_T);
101 
106  const Eigen::VectorXd& getSurfaceRhoi() const { return mv_rhoi; }
107 
111  const Eigen::VectorXd& getSurfaceT() const { return mv_T; }
112 
116  bool isSurfaceStateSet() const { return m_is_surface_state_set; }
117 
121  void setSolidProperties(
122  const std::string& solid_model,
123  const DataSolidProperties& data_solid_props);
124 
128  const SurfaceProperties& surfaceProps() const {
129  return *mp_surf_props;
130  }
131 
135  const SolidProperties& solidProps() const {
136  return *mp_solid_props;
137  }
138 
139 private:
140  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& m_thermo;
141  const SurfaceProperties* mp_surf_props;
142  const SolidProperties* mp_solid_props;
143 
144  const size_t m_ns;
145  const size_t m_nT;
146 
147  Eigen::VectorXd mv_rhoi;
148  Eigen::VectorXd mv_T;
149 
150  bool m_is_surface_state_set;
151 };
152 
153  } // namespace GasSurfaceInteraction
154 } // namespace Mutation
